subproject.description: The key objective of this project is to strengthen the capacity of the Government to ensure the long-term sustainability of social security reform. The concrete project tasks will involve technical support in (i) strengthening the capacity in management and investment of pension funds; (ii) enhancing the capacity in social protection policy formulation, analysis and design; (iii) improving the quality of social service delivery to elderly and disabled; and (iv) education and communication campaigns to increase public awareness.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Social Protection Systems

subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities

title: Support to social protection system development
